branchCategory.name: Support Guide
branchCategory.description: <p>An LEFG guide shares dimensions with the LEFS and LEFB body, but has no motor. It functions as a support for a significantly overhanging workpiece that is moved by a driving slider. The guide is equipped with a seal band that prevents the ingress of grease and other external foreign matter. A typical application is in support of a large loading platform in a multi-axis pick-and-place operation</p>

branchItem.name: LEFG, Support Guide, Ball Screw/Belt Drive

branchItem.name: 11-LEFG, Support Guide, Ball Screw, Clean Room
branchItem.description: <p>An LEFG guide shares dimensions with the LEFS and LEFB body, but has no motor. It functions as a support for a significantly overhanging workpiece that is moved by a driving slider. branchItem.name: Table Spacer for LEFG
branchItem.description: <p>When using an LEFG32 Support Guide with an LEFS32 with parallel mounted motor, there will be a height difference between mounting tables.  The LEFG support guide's table is 3mm lower, and requires a table spacer to match the acutator's table height.</p>
